mapper.select: SELECT * FROM userAsset WHERE createDate = ( SELECT MAX(createDate) FROM userAsset AS sub WHERE sub.userId = userAsset.userId )
SELECT * FROM userAsset WHERE type = #{type} ORDER BY createDate DESC LIMIT 100

SELECT type, AVG(JSON_LENGTH(cash)) as avgCashCount, AVG( (SELECT SUM(CAST(value AS DECIMAL(10,2))) FROM JSON_TABLE(cash, '$[*]' COLUMNS (value VARCHAR(50) PATH '$')) as jt ) ) as avgCashTotal, AVG(JSON_LENGTH(stock)) as avgStockCount, AVG( (SELECT SUM(CAST(value AS DECIMAL(10,2))) FROM JSON_TABLE(stock, '$[*]' COLUMNS (value VARCHAR(50) PATH '$')) as jt ) ) as avgStockTotal, AVG(JSON_LENGTH(deposit)) as avgDepositCount, AVG( (SELECT SUM(CAST(value AS DECIMAL(10,2))) FROM JSON_TABLE(deposit, '$[*]' COLUMNS (value VARCHAR(50) PATH '$')) as jt ) ) as avgDepositTotal, AVG(JSON_LENGTH(insurance)) as avgInsuranceCount, AVG( (SELECT SUM(CAST(value AS DECIMAL(10,2))) FROM JSON_TABLE(insurance, '$[*]' COLUMNS (value VARCHAR(50) PATH '$')) as jt ) ) as avgInsuranceTotal, AVG(loanAmount) as avgLoanAmount FROM userAsset GROUP BY type
